name: Tiny Love
description: TINY LOVE! is a free to play richly detailed 5 minute ride with colorful, cute main characters specially well suited for children and highly recommended for a fun family time. TINY LOVE! is a VR animated short whose characters were created by Chibi Shibu SAC and produced by renowned director Eduardo Schuldt that follows the adventure of the demon pup NEFASTO and the angel princess LUBELLA who fall in love at first sight. Their forbidden love embarks them on a journey through mystical worlds and see magical creatures as they try to escape and follow their hearts.
